thread.title: 'This is absolute nonsense' - Ancelotti rubbishes Vidal to Chelsea rumours
thread.title_full: 'This is absolute nonsense' - Ancelotti rubbishes Vidal to Chelsea rumours

title: 'This is absolute nonsense' - Ancelotti rubbishes Vidal to Chelsea rumours
text:
0 04-Jan-2017 19:04:21 Social media fuelled talk of the Chile international leaving the Allianz Arena for Stamford Bridge, speculation that has been rubbished by his manager 
Bayern Munich coach Carlo Ancelotti has labelled talk of Arturo Vidal moving to Chelsea as nonsense. 
Zidane is Real's kingpin, not Ronaldo 
Vidal, who played under Chelsea manager Antonio Conte at Juventus, fuelled speculation over a switch from the Bundesliga champions to the Premier League leaders when he liked an Instagram post from a Chelsea fan page regarding rumours of a transfer to Stamford Bridge. 
But, asked about the possibility of Vidal leaving for Chelsea at Bayern's training camp in Doha, Ancelotti replied: "This is absolute nonsense." 
It had previously been reported, by the Sun , that Conte had met with the midfielder and his agents on Boxing Day with a view to a Â£34 million transfer during the January window. 
Vidal has made 21 appearances in all competitions for Bayern this season, scoring three goals. Related
